item.title: eh_GJBaseRequest
item.description: Inherits: HTTPRequest > Node > Object Inherited by: eh_GJUsersAuthRequest, eh_GJUsersFetchRequest Description This Class is not to be used directly, rather it is the base class for all of GameJolt’s Endpoint Requests. This contains the base to build urls and manage responses Properties type property default value String game_id Null String private_key Null String username Null String user_token Null Signals gj_request_failed(error_dict) Signal sent when requests fail.
